basics.name: Hongjia Liu
basics.summary: Double-degree MSc student in autonomous systems and intelligent robots researching world models, imitation learning, and trustworthy perception.

work.name: Astribot (Stardust Intelligence)
work.summary: Investigating how RSSM-based world models interface with imitation learning and vision-language-action policies for multi-task robotic manipulation.
highlights: Blend DreamerV2/V3 and TD-MPC2-style latents with ACT, Diffusion Policy, OpenPi, and OpenVLA controllers.
Research remedies for state confusion in multi-task settings by reshaping latent memory with object-centric signals.

work.name: Zhejiang Lab
work.summary: Explored 3D Gaussian Splatting pipelines for reflective surfaces such as automotive glass.
highlights: Evaluated reconstruction fidelity vs. performance for large-scale scene captures.
Collaborated with interdisciplinary hardware and perception teams to prototype scalable systems.
